alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 04 at 9:41AM EST until February 04 at 7:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Southeast Suffolk, Southwest Suffolk and Northeast Suffolk Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing rain will likely not develop until mid to late afternoon, possibly as late as early evening across the south fork of eastern Long Island.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk
